cards.title: Dreadnought
powers: {Dreadnought} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
One player may draw 2 cards. If they do, they discard a card.
Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

openingLines.default: Shut up and stand down. This is the only warning you get.

cards.title: Atomic Piledriver
body: You may play an Ongoing card.
{Dreadnought} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Discard the top card of your deck.
cards.flavorText: Man, he's ugly right now. Do not{BR}ever reenter the atmosphere face-first.{BR}It's super bad for you.

cards.title: Battle Joy
body: Whenever {Dreadnought} is dealt damage by a non-hero target, discard the top card of your deck.
At the start of your turn, if you have 3 or more cards in your trash, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: It's the best feeling in the world.{BR}It is [b][i]right.[/i][/b] It is [b][i]necessary.[/i][/b] When I'm{BR}fighting, everything is perfect.

cards.title: Faster than a Jet
body: At the end of your turn, you may play a card or use a power. If you do, {Dreadnought} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
The first time {Dreadnought} is dealt damage by any non-hero target each turn, she may deal that target 1 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Falling to Earth at{BR}Mach 25 in a bathtub of fire, I begin{BR}to laugh. Other girls my age worry{BR}about midterms and prom dates.

cards.title: First into the Fray
body: At the end of your power phase, if {Dreadnought} dealt no damage this turn, {Dreadnought} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
powers: {Dreadnought} deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each. Discard the top card of your deck.
cards.flavorText: No space for thought,{BR}no room for plans, only instinct and{BR}rage. I love it. I am alive down to my{BR}toenails, and I can't stop smiling.

cards.title: Go Through
body: {Dreadnought} deals 1 target 4 melee damage.
{Dreadnought} deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage.
Discard the top 2 cards of your deck.
cards.flavorText: A vortex of shredded{BR}paperwork is sucked up in my wake,{BR}and I explode out the side of the{BR}building in a cloud of shattered glass.

cards.title: Grab and Twist
body: {Dreadnought} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Until the start of your turn, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1.
Discard the top card of your deck.
cards.flavorText: With a sharp tug, I{BR}rip the weapon straight out of her{BR}chest. A tangle of tubes and wires{BR}comes with it, wet and snapping.

cards.title: Harder than Diamond
body: Reduce non-lightning damage dealt to {Dreadnought} by 1.

Whenever a target is reduced from 1 or more to 0 or fewer HP or a non-target environment card is destroyed, {Dreadnought} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavorText: My name is Danielle Tozer.{BR}I am a girl. No one is strong enough{BR}to take that from me anymore.

cards.title: It's Nice Having a Friend
body: At the start of your turn, you may destroy one of your Ongoing cards. If you do, draw 2 cards.
powers: Discard 2 cards. If you discarded 2 cards this way, {Dreadnought} and another hero target each regain 2 HP.
cards.flavorText: My throat is a little{BR}tight, and when I hug her there's an{BR}instant of tension in her shoulders{BR}before she relaxes and hugs me back.

cards.title: Mightier than a Battleship
body: Increase damage dealt by {Dreadnought} to other targets by 1.

At the end of your turn, {Dreadnought} deals 1 villain target 0 psychic damage. Then, if {Dreadnought} has dealt no damage to other hero targets this turn, she deals 1 other hero character target 0 psychic damage unless you put the bottom card of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavorText: They came after{BR}me because I'm the one who scares{BR}them. Because they knew I was the most{BR}dangerous. Well, they were right.

cards.title: Open Up to Someone
body: At the end of your turn, discard up to 2 cards. If you discard 2 cards this way, {Dreadnought} regains 1 HP.
powers: Draw a card. Discard up to 3 cards. X heroes each draw a card, where X = the number of cards discarded this way.
cards.flavorText: Now's the time, I{BR}know it is. If I chicken out now,{BR}I'll be putting this off for months.{BR}But holy crap, this is scary.

cards.title: Orbital Guidance
body: Search your deck and/or trash for up to 2 Mantle cards and put them into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
You may play a Mantle card.
{Dreadnought} may deal 1 target 2 irreducible melee damage. If she dealt no damage this way, return this card to your hand.
cards.flavorText: The navigational gates{BR}are turning amber now, and in the{BR}distance they fade toward red, my signal{BR}to begin slowing down for reentry.

cards.title: Repair the Lattice
body: {Dreadnought} deals herself 4 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom 3 cards of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
One hero target regains 5 HP.
If {Dreadnought} was dealt 2 or more psychic damage this turn, she may regain 2 HP or use a power.
cards.flavorText: Nausea flushes{BR}through me, but the thread holds. And{BR}now, one of those holes in my pattern{BR}has a bright white line crossing it.

cards.title: See the Underpinnings
body: Reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. Shuffle 2 of them back into that deck. Put the remaining card on the top or bottom of that deck.

flavorQuotes.text: How did you see them{BR}through the glare?

cards.title: Show Vulnerability
body: You may put any number of your Mantle cards from play into your hand.
Search your deck or trash for an Ongoing card and put it into play or into your hand.
Shuffle your trash into your deck.
cards.flavorText: They'll make a man{BR}of me. Show me how to be a man.{BR}Teach me to man up by beating me down.{BR}[b][i]They never ask if I want to be a man.[/i][/b]

cards.title: Woven into Reality
body: At the end of your turn, you may draw a card.
powers: Destroy an Ongoing or non-target environment card. {Dreadnought} deals herself 3 irreducible psychic damage unless you put the bottom 2 cards of your trash on the bottom of your deck.
cards.flavorText: I can see the structure{BR}behind reality. Okay, not [b][i]see[/i][/b], precisely,{BR}but it's there. An infinite lattice of matter{BR}and energy, of thought and form.

cards.title: Yank the Threads
body: {Dreadnought} deals 1 target 7 irreducible projectile damage.
You may shuffle your trash into your deck. If you moved 2 or fewer cards to your deck this way, {Dreadnought} deals herself 3 irreducible toxic damage.
Discard the top card of your deck.
cards.flavorText: Red Steel encounters the Hubble{BR}Space Telescope the way a baseball{BR}encounters a home run derby.
